data.title: Breaking News: KAJI TECH CO., LTD Graces the Pages of the Newsweek magazine’s International Edition! – KAJI TECH CO., LTD.
data.meta_description: We are pioneer of fastening industry. We specialize in plastic(POM) snap buttons.MADE IN JAPAN
data.text:
December 2023 issue

We’re elated to share that KAJI TECH CO., LTD has garnered the spotlight in the December 2023 issue of the Newsweek’s International Edition! This momentous recognition is a tribute to the relentless commitment and groundbreaking endeavors of our entire team.

In the latest edition of Newsweek, our company shines in an illuminating feature that delves into our efforts of providing safe plastic snaps for a variety of garments from infant clothing to sports apparel and working uniforms. This esteemed acknowledgment underscores our dedication to the Apparel industry, and we’re privileged to share our narrative with a global audience.

Our feature in the Newsweek magazine is a testament to our journey thus far, and it ignites our passion to continue shaping the future of the industry with unwavering resolve.

We extend our heartfelt appreciation to folks over at Newsweek for this esteemed accolade, and we’re eager to embark on the next chapter of our venture, fueled by this momentous recognition.

Stay tuned as we continue to make waves and push boundaries at KAJI TECH!

‘’It is our mission to provide safety to babies and children, both in Japan and worldwide. That is our goal for the future.’

– Noboru Kajiura

(President, KAJI TECH CO., LTD)
